revisions.rev:
{{Infobox Company | company_name = CMC Magnetics Corporation | company_logo = <!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:CMC logo.gif]] --> | company_type = (TSE 2323) | foundation = 1978 | location = [[Taipei]], [[Taiwan]], ROC | industry = [[Digital media]] | homepage = [http://www.cmcnet.com.tw www.cmcnet.com.tw] }} '''CMC Magnetics Corporation''' is [[optical disc]] manufacturer, established in 1978.
== Products == CMC produces CD and DVD storage media products, including: CD-R, CD-RW, DVD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW, DVD-RAM, Floppy Diskettes, Media Packaging. CMC media is sold by [[HP]], Maxprint, [[Imation]], [[Memorex]], [[Philips]], [[TDK]], [[Verbatim Corporation|Verbatim]], [[Staples Inc.|Staples]], [[Office Depot]] brand and many [[Original equipment manufacturer|OEM]] brands. Mr. Data is CMC's own brand. They have CD-R factories in Taiwan, China (Memorex, HP, Philips, TDK) and Hong Kong (Memorex, Philips).
== External links == * [http://www.cmcnet.com.tw/ CMC Magnetics Corporation's web site] * [http://www.cmcdisc.com/index.htm CMC Magnetics Corporation's sales site]
